data.name: ReadCashReceiptDetailRlnRsn
data.value: select top(1) CRDTL_RLN_RSN_ID, CODE, NAME, EFFECTIVE_DATE, DISCONTINUE_DATE, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TMST, DESCRIPTION from CKT_CRDTL_RLN_RSN where (CODE = @code) and (EFFECTIVE_DATE <= @effectiveDate) and (DISCONTINUE_DATE > @effectiveDate)
